Description: * P A W N S H O P * G U I T A R S * Serving The World With Quality Vintage and Used Gear!- Up for sale is a 70's Matsumoku/ Antoria LP Oly White Deluxe 59' Standard Electric Guitar & OHSC - Cool guitar, in good condition, this is essentially an Ibanez with the Antoria logo marketed in the UK- version sounds & plays very good- original standard pickups & electronics!, which totally scream!- smooth & fast play action!- has a few light dings, & pecks around Head stock tip & sides, neck, and body, and a few swipes, and pick gouges, in play area between pups- comes with original hard case- old school tuners, tunomatic type bridge,- case has a bit of shelf wear and minor scratches, but is solid with all latches- plays great with minimal fret wear for years of life!- has finish crack on lower neck pocket joint- has a few small pecks on back of head stock tip, and front edges, and some polish swirling on body, along with minimal buckle wear on back of body- case has travel and storage wear, but has all latches, and closes tight- Please Click on pix to see a larger view!- We are a small family business, If for any reason you do not see this as a quality purchase- Please contact me before leaving a less than excellent rating- A.J. Ciardetti @ Guido's Hot Springs Music- We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase!! Title: 70's Matsumoku/ Antoria LP Oly White Deluxe 59' Standard Electric Guitar & OHSC
ConditionDescription: Cool guitar, in good condition, this is essentially an Ibanez with the Antoria logo marketed in the UK- version sounds & plays very good- original standard pickups & electronics!, which totally scream!- smooth & fast play action!- has a few light dings, & pecks around Head stock tip & sides, neck, and body, and a few swipes, and pick gouges, in play area between pups- comes with original hard case- old school tuners, tunomatic type bridge,- case has a bit of shelf wear and minor scratches, but is solid with all latches- plays great with minimal fret wear for years of life!- has finish crack on lower neck pocket joint- has a few small pecks on back of head stock tip, and front edges, and some polish swirling on body, along with minimal buckle wear on back of body- case has travel and storage wear, but has all latches, and closes tight-
